name: Discharge (itch) (Loann Courcoul, Pandorage, Kilian Bry)
description:
Discharge is a game made for a school project.
The initial idea was take with the series Love Death & Robots. This is a game of exploration and collection, you have to complete your collection. Discharge was made by a team of 4 developpers, including me.  Here’s their itch's page Pandorage / Kilian Bry / Valentin Lebaudy. CONTROLS : MOVE :
“ZQSD”, “AWSD” or ArrowsSEARCH :EOPEN INVENTORY :IOPEN CRAFT :
COPEN COLLECTION :
FRECIPES PANEL : UPAUSE MENU :Escape
